mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (name, title, content, reg_date, viewCnt) VALUES (#{name}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, name, reg_date, viewCnt FROM board ORDER BY reg_date DESC, bno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT bno, title, content, name FROM board WHERE bno = #{bno}
